extendedInfo.description: Get the Fantasy Sports Trade Associations 2013 Award for "Best Mobile App" and win your fantasy baseball league this year!Are you playing fantasy baseball at ESPN, Yahoo, CBS or other league manager that requires you to make daily lineup changes? Then if you are serious about winning you HAVE to have this app. Nothing is worse than finding out your player did not start on any given day and you did not know it. Inevitably your reserve always goes 3-4 with a HR! Problem is nobody has the time to live in front of their computer waiting to see who is in and who is out and in the big leagues, everyone gets days off (catchers especially). Worry no more, we have solved that problem for you! Everyone spends a ton of time, energy and money preparing for their draft but this service will help you actually WIN THIS YEAR! Fantasy Alarm is THE FANTASY BASEBALL SECRET WEAPON! FantasyAlarm Fantasy Baseball Lineup Optimizer, from the revolutionary developers of FantasyAlarm.com, gives you direct access to the information the press uses to report fantasy sports news and information! That's right, we exclusively get it directly from the league office and send it straight to your iPhone or iPad within seconds! Is your player not starting? Don't worry, you'll now be the first to know, and most importantly, you will have this critical information well before game time. Make the timely changes that take your team to a championship! Never START a BENCHED player again! FEATURES: You Will Receive Real-Time Alarms When A Player On Your Roster: â¢ Player does not appear in the daily line-up (approximately 60 - 90 minutes before game time) - Tracked by using MLB official lineups. â¢ Breaking information and news tracking all major media outlets and social media.â¢ Player has been moved to the DL, sent to minors, or placed on the inactive list (or removed from the 25-man roster for any reason).â¢ Player is removed from the DL for any reason. (i.e., added from the 25 man roster).â¢ Player involved in a game that is rained out or postponedâ¢ Probable pitcher notification (24 hours prior to start)â¢ Game time decisions tracking various media outlets (including pre-game broadcasts) on whether a player will play in a game or not (and other game-time decisions).â¢ Breaking information, news, trends or favorable match-ups for your tracked players.â¢ Team closer changes.----Disclaimer - FantasyAlarm.com, LLC is not affiliated with Yahoo, CBS, ESPN.

reviews.title: Always have your best lineup!!!
reviews.comment: Does what its supposed to do. Especially helpful if you need to change your lineup on a daily basis.
reviews.author: ELBY TINEO

reviews.title: Useful app, when it loads.
reviews.comment: 4 stars is generous at this point. It updates me on players I dropped last week, half of the time I try to add or drop a player, the app won\'t load. 5 stars when you fix that.
reviews.author: bryan glick

reviews.title: New update messed something up!
reviews.comment: Was working fine until recent update! I haven\'t received any alarms since June 21 update and the alarm section refuses to even load. Please fix.
reviews.author: E Hill

reviews.title: Not so good anymore
reviews.comment: Was amazing until the last update.  Now I don\'t get notified when my players are out of my lineup, and that\'s if the app even loads.  Disappointing.  Galaxy s3
reviews.author: brian molter

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Rarely tells you when your players are not in the line up.
reviews.author: Jose Streeter

reviews.title: New update killed the notifications
reviews.comment: No notifications sent to phone after update
reviews.author: Aaron Ever

reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do with a caveat
reviews.comment: Serious battery drain, almost as much as my display. Have to uninstall.
reviews.author: James Murtha

reviews.title: Sometimes useful
reviews.comment: Just happened and really hate it when the alarm goes witj the game in progress. Can\'t do nothing but get me madder.
reviews.author: Hector Mariani

reviews.title: Seems to be operating now
reviews.comment: I\'ve been getting updates the past few days on players sitting so back to 4*.
reviews.author: Brent Williams

reviews.comment: Alarms and news is so far behind. Its old news by the time you get alert. Need to get news way faster to be a worthy download. Dont waste your time.\tDont waste your time. Alarms come hours after news is already out.
reviews.author: Matt B

reviews.title: Get this app!
reviews.comment: Get the Fantasy Sports Trade Associations 2013 Award for \"Best Mobile App\" and win your fantasy baseball league this year!
reviews.author: Henry Kame

reviews.title: Nice for setting lineups
reviews.comment: Would be 5 star if you could add top prospects to your alarm list to get notified when they get the call. Ex. Wil Myers/Yelich/Wheeler
reviews.author: david hanzlik

reviews.title: Fair, but not always actionable
reviews.comment: Decent app, does what it says.  However, most actual warnings come too late to act on.
reviews.author: Jonathan Woodman

reviews.title: I check my alarm before my texts on my work breaks
reviews.author: Jesse Walker

reviews.title: P.o.s. app
reviews.comment: Crashed every time after I registered. Don\'t waste your time!!
reviews.author: Jared Richardson

reviews.title: Xperia J
reviews.comment: Use this app on my Xperia J. Works as advertised, great experience!
reviews.author: Adreno Sna

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I waited for this app for a long time... finally it comes
reviews.author: Randus Cjaken

reviews.title: Ok app, could be better.
reviews.comment: Does not let you track payers in AAA. I want news when they get called up. Also, when I remove a tracked payer, I would like the player buzz to be removed from my feed.
reviews.author: Chris Ransdell

reviews.title: doesnt work
reviews.comment: a 5 year old made this app zero stars wouldnt let me add a player or do anything waste of time
reviews.author: Corey Colwell
